title: 如何点击图片跳转链接
author: 远远困了
txt_content:
我想让这张图跳转到我服务器的宣传贴链接
https://tu.tianji.link/images/2020/07/17/pic.png

↑这是图片的URL

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: [url=https://www.baidu.com][img]https://tu.tianji.link/images/2020/07/17/pic.png[/img][/url]复制代码[url=跳转的链接][img]https://tu.tianji.link/images/2020/07/17/pic.png[/img][/url]复制代码
